Hey everyone! I thought that I would share something that I have been working on… a rulebook for Dagers High! I am still working on some of the images, and the rulebook is subject to small edits and changes, but the mechanics are final (hopefully!). Please let me know what you think, and any changes I should make, in the comments below! Thanks!

 

Click here to see a pdf version of them: Rules

Click here to go to a google doc where you can make comments: Google Doc
